DOC.brief_title: Combination Chemotherapy Pegfilgrastim Treating Patients With Previously Untreated Germ Cell Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy chemotherapy comprise paclitaxel , ifosfamide , cisplatin combination pegfilgrastim patient previously untreated intermediate- poor-risk germ cell tumor . - Determine safety regimen patient . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 120-180 minute day 1 2 , cisplatin IV 30 minute ifosfamide IV 120 minute day 1-5 , pegfilgrastim subcutaneously day 6 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Some patient may require surgery chemotherapy , viable non-teratomatous germ cell tumor find surgical specimen interval disease progression , patient may receive 1-2 course chemotherapy surgery . After completion study treatment , patient follow 28 day every 2 month 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 55 patient accrue study .
